results.title: Twisted Box Chain Necklace | .925 Sterling Silver (16", 18", 20", 22", 24" lengths) Fine, sparkly chain.
results.description:
The twisted box is a pretty, dainty and sparkly chain. The square links are connected in a rotating manner, causing the light to elegantly shine off different angles of the links. This chain is charming on its own or when paired with a delicate pendant.

- Made of solid .925 Sterling Silver (not plated)
- Excellent quality, Italian-made.
- Width: 1 mm 

________________________________________

Unsure of which length to choose?
We strongly recommend measuring your desired length by wrapping a string around your neck and mark it at the spot you would like your chain to rest. Measure that on a ruler and you'll have your answer!

Although all necks are different, this is the typical resting spots of our different lengths. If you have a larger frame, we would recommend going up a length. 

For Women:
- 16″ chains are ideal for those who want their chain to rest just below their neck, in between the collarbone.
- 18″ chains are the most popular sizing choice. They rest in the middle of the chest, a bit below the collarbone.
- 20″ chains are nice options to wear over a crew neck t-shirt, or with a deep cut top. They rest slightly lower on the chest.
- 22″ chains are a nice mid-length chain. They look beautiful over a shirt or sweater.
- 24″ chains are the shortest style chain that will fit over most people’s heads. Perfect for those who have trouble with clasps.

_______________________________________

Shipping:
*Canada:
Free untracked shipping in Canada!
Orders are shipped through Canada Post's Lettermail service and do NOT include tracking. Generally a delivery will take 3-12 business days, dependent on where you live, but we can not guarantee these times. Snazzy Stones strives to send out your orders quickly, but once dropped off at Canada Post, it is in their hands and we can only cross our fingers for a quick delivery!

Express Shipping may be added at checkout for an additional cost if you need your item quicker or would like it tracked. 


*USA:
We are excited to open our shop to our neighbours this year!
Free tracked shipping in USA!

_______________________________________

Packaging
In order to be able to provide free shipping, our items will not be packaged in boxes. 

_______________________________________
Exchanges and Returns
We want you to be 100% happy with your purchase! If you would like to exchange or return an item, please contact me within 7 days of receiving your item. Jewellery must be in unworn condition. Buyer is responsible for return shipping costs.

results.title: Snake Chain Necklace | .925 Sterling Silver (16", 18", 20", 22", 24", 30", 36" lengths)
results.description:
The classic snake chain is comprised of tightly woven sterling silver bands. This gives the chain a sleek, polished appearance which will maintain its curved manner while holding the weight of a pendant.

- Made of solid .925 Sterling Silver (not plated)
- Excellent quality, Italian-made.
- Width: 1 mm and 1.6 mm widths available. 
________________________________________

Unsure of which length to choose?
To remove the guesswork of deciding on your chain length, we recommend simply wrapping a string around your neck and mark it at the desired spot you would like your chain to rest. Measure that on a ruler and you'll have your answer!

Although all necks are different, this is the typical resting spots of our different lengths. If you have a larger frame, we would recommend going up a length. 

For Women:
- 16″ chains are ideal for those who want their chain to rest just below their neck, in between the collarbone.
- 18″ chains are the most popular sizing choice. They rest in the middle of the chest, a bit below the collarbone.
- 20″ chains are nice options to wear over a crew neck t-shirt, or with a deep cut top. They rest slightly lower on the chest.
- 22″ chains are a nice mid-length chain. They look beautiful over a shirt or sweater.
- 24″ chains are the shortest style chain that will fit over most people’s heads. Perfect for those who have trouble with clasps.
- 30″ chains are the most popular long length chain. This length pairs well when double layering with an 18” chain.
- 36″ chains are the longest chain we have available. It typically rests mid tummy.
_______________________________________

Shipping:
*Canada:
Free untracked shipping in Canada!
Orders are shipped through Canada Post's Lettermail service and do NOT include tracking. Generally a delivery will take 3-12 business days, dependent on where you live, but we can not guarantee these times. Snazzy Stones strives to send out your orders quickly, but once dropped off at Canada Post, it is in their hands and we can only cross our fingers for a quick delivery!

Express Shipping may be added at checkout for an additional cost if you need your item quicker or would like it tracked.

- Made of solid .925 Sterling Silver (not plated)
- Excellent quality, Italian-made.

results.title: Snake Chain Necklace (Faceted) | .925 Sterling Silver (16", 18", 20", 24" lengths)
results.description:
The classic snake chain is comprised of tightly woven sterling silver bands. This gives the chain a sleek, polished appearance which will maintain its curved manner while holding the weight of a pendant. This chain is then faceted into four shiny sides, adding extra sheen to the chain. Regular, rounded versions are also available - see them in our shop!

- Made of solid .925 Sterling Silver (not plated)
- Excellent quality, Italian-made.
- Chain Width: 1.2 mm

________________________________________

Unsure of which length to choose?
We strongly recommend measuring your desired length by wrapping a string around your neck and mark it at the spot you would like your chain to rest. Measure that on a ruler and you'll have your answer!

Although all necks are different, this is the typical resting spots of our different lengths. If you have a larger frame, we would recommend going up a length. 

For Women:
- 16″ chains are ideal for those who want their chain to rest just below their neck, in between the collarbone.
- 18″ chains are the most popular sizing choice. They rest in the middle of the chest, a bit below the collarbone.
- 20″ chains are nice options to wear over a crew neck t-shirt, or with a deep cut top. They rest slightly lower on the chest.
- 24″ chains are the shortest style chain that will fit over most people’s heads. Perfect for those who have trouble with clasps.

_______________________________________

results.title: Snake Ball Necklace | .925 Sterling Silver (14", 16", and 18" lengths)
results.description:
This chain incorporates the refined look of the Snake Chain with fixed silver balls 3.5 cm apart. Shining on its own, with no pendant required - it can be worn casually or dressed up for two gorgeous looks. 

- Made of solid .925 Sterling Silver (not plated).
- Excellent quality, Italian-made.
- 1.2 mm snake chain and 4 mm silver balls.

Faceted Chain:
- Has a brighter sheen than the rounded chain

Rounded Chain:
- Has a more subtle shine than the faceted chain. 

Matching bracelet and anklet also available!
Bracelet:
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/969939881/snake-ball-bracelet-925-sterling-silver?ref=shop_home_active_3&frs=1&crt=1

Anklet:
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/998617344/snake-ball-anklet-925-sterling-silver?ref=shop_home_active_2&frs=1&crt=1

________________________________________

Unsure of which length to choose?
We strongly recommend measuring your desired length by wrapping a string around your neck and mark it at the spot you would like your chain to rest. Measure that on a ruler and you'll have your answer!

Although all necks are different, this is the typical resting spots of our different lengths. If you have a larger frame, we would recommend going up a length.

- 14" is quite small and only suited for those with a small neck wanting a choker or for children.
- 16″ chains are ideal for those who want their chain to rest just below their neck, in between the collarbone.
- 18″ chains are the most popular sizing choice. They rest in the middle of the chest, a bit below the collarbone.

results.title: Box Chain Necklace | .925 Sterling Silver (16", 18", 20", 22", 24", 30", 36" lengths)
results.description:
Box chains are made up of numerous square links connected to form a chain; the surfaces of which reflect the light giving it a nice shine. The box link is flexible and a good everyday chain. The box is a flexible link and the 1.4 mm thickness is popular for both men and women. 

- Made of solid .925 Sterling Silver (not plated)
- Excellent quality, Italian-made.
- Width: 1 mm and 1.4 mm available.

________________________________________

Unsure of which length to choose?
We strongly recommend measuring your desired length by wrapping a string around your neck and mark it at the spot you would like your chain to rest. Measure that on a ruler and you'll have your answer!

Although all necks are different, this is the typical resting spots of our different lengths. If you have a larger frame, we would recommend going up a length. 

For Women:
- 16″ chains are ideal for those who want their chain to rest just below their neck, in between the collarbone.
- 18″ chains are the most popular sizing choice. They rest in the middle of the chest, a bit below the collarbone.
- 20″ chains are nice options to wear over a crew neck t-shirt, or with a deep cut top. They rest slightly lower on the chest.
- 22″ chains are a nice mid-length chain. They look beautiful over a shirt or sweater.
- 24″ chains are the shortest style chain that will fit over most people’s heads. Perfect for those who have trouble with clasps.
- 30″ chains are the most popular long length chain. This length pairs well when double layering with an 18” chain.
- 36″ chains are the longest chain we have available. It typically rests mid tummy.

For Men:
- 18" chains are ideal for teenagers, those with slimmer necks, or those that are looking for a shorter chain.
- 20" chains and 22" chains are the two most popular sizes for most men.
- 24" is ideal for someone with a thicker neck or who wants a longer chain.
_______________________________________

Shipping:
*Canada:
Free untracked shipping in Canada!
Orders are shipped through Canada Post's Lettermail service and do NOT include tracking. We strongly recommend measuring your desired length by wrapping a string around your neck and mark it at the spot you would like your chain to rest. Measure that on a ruler and you'll have your answer!

Although all necks are different, this is the typical resting spots of our different lengths. If you have a larger frame, we would recommend going up a length. 

For Women:
- 30″ chains are the most popular long length chain. This length pairs well when double layering with an 18” chain.

_______________________________________

Shipping:
*Canada:
Free untracked shipping in Canada!
Orders are shipped through Canada Post's Lettermail service and do NOT include tracking. Generally a delivery will take 3-12 business days, dependent on where you live, but we can not guarantee these times. Snazzy Stones strives to send out your orders quickly, but once dropped off at Canada Post, it is in their hands and we can only cross our fingers for a quick delivery!

Express Shipping may be added at checkout for an additional cost if you need your item quicker or would like it tracked. 


*USA:
We are excited to open our shop to our neighbours this year!
Free tracked shipping in USA!

_______________________________________

Packaging
In order to be able to provide free shipping, our items will not packaged in boxes. 

_______________________________________
Exchanges and Returns
We want you to be 100% happy with your purchase! If you would like to exchange or return an item, please contact me within 7 days of receiving your item. Jewellery must be in unworn condition. Buyer is responsible for return shipping costs.

results.title: Snake Ball Chain Necklace (Fine) | .925 Sterling Silver (16", 18", 20" lengths)  Diamond Cut
results.description:
No pendant required, this timeless chain combines the classic snake chain with perfectly polished little silver balls. 

- Made of solid .925 Sterling Silver (not plated)
- Excellent quality, Italian-made.
- Width: 3mm balls, 1.2mm chain.
- Diamond Cut Snake Chain

Matching bracelet and necklace also available!
Bracelet:
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/1098060613/fine-snake-ball-bracelet-925-sterling?ref=shop_home_active_27&frs=1

Anklet:
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/1161552118/fine-snake-ball-anklet-925-sterling?click_key=b35810746fdec2e257455038c2eac4c5d2bfe6ab%3A1161552118&click_sum=45829a3f&ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

_______________________________________

Unsure of which length to choose?
We strongly recommend measuring your desired length by wrapping a string around your neck and mark it at the spot you would like your chain to rest. Measure that on a ruler and you'll have your answer!

Although all necks are different, this is the typical resting spots of our different lengths. If you have a larger frame, we would recommend going up a length. 

For Women:
- 16″ chains are ideal for those who want their chain to rest just below their neck, in between the collarbone.
- 18″ chains are the most popular sizing choice. They rest in the middle of the chest, a bit below the collarbone.
- 20″ chains are nice options to wear over a crew neck t-shirt, or with a deep cut top. They rest slightly lower on the chest.

_______________________________________
